title: Advertisement, "Restaurat Florent:  Salt Shaker", late 1980s–early 1990s
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: A photograph of a restaurant-style glass salkshaker with metal screw cap is centered within a rectangle, outlined by thin black lines, and occupying almost the entire page. Restaurant Florent, in thin capitals, appears above the image in a curved format. M&Co is imprinted vertically in miniature letters within the rectangle on the lower left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Advertisement, "Restaurat Florent:  Salt Shaker", late 1980s–early 1990s.
late 1980s–early 1990s. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-294.
